title: Protected
description: To be with him was life-changing from the start because he is a consequential man. But loving her has its own sets of consequences and they are fatal repercussions.Eric Rhodes-Rayton has one priority and one priority only - to protect Shannon Quinn at all costs. Even if it means spending his entire life in hiding with her, he will keep safe the woman he dared falling for, the one who crawled her way inside his heart and the one who saw the light creeping in through the little crack in his walls.But it is not so easy when the threat is still at large with an obsessive desire of snatching away the woman he loves.Will Eric succeed in protecting Shannon or will the villain catch up to them?Will they manage to live their well deserved happily ever after?
author: Misha Blake
